mozilla.components.concept.tabstray

Interface TabsTray.Observer

  • Enclosing interface:
    TabsTray

    public static TabsTray.Observer

    Interface to be implemented by classes that want to observe a tabs tray.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Default Methods
